info.title: Hornet API
info.description:
The Hornet API can be used to programmatically update exposed association data. If you're missing functionality or you experience any problem using the API, you can always contact us.

You will need an API token consisting of a client id and a token value in order to use this API. You can either authenticate using a request header or a query parameter, the choice is yours.

The API is only documented in English.

archive_enabled.title: Archive enabled.
archive_enabled.description: By setting this to true, a archive mailbox will be created which will receive all mails sent to this committee.

archive_enabled.title: Archive enabled.
archive_enabled.description: By setting this to true, a archive mailbox will be created which will receive all mails sent to this committee.

admin.title: Whether the user should be administrator.

mail_size.title: User-specific mailbox limit. Send "null" to clear the user-specific mailbox limit.
mail_size.description:
You will need to enter a valid storage size here, in the format <number><G/M/K>. For example, use 1G for one
gigabyte.

admin.title: Whether the user should be administrator.

mail_size.title: User-specific mailbox limit. Send "null" to set to the default mailbox limit.
mail_size.description:
You will need to enter a valid storage size here, in the format <number><G/M/K>. For example, use 1G for one
gigabyte.

username.title: User e-mail address, which will be used to determine whether it is a new or existing user.

default_emailbox_size.title: Default email box size.
default_emailbox_size.description:
You will need to enter a valid storage size here, in the format <number><G/M/K>. For example, use 1G for one
gigabyte.

username.title: User e-mail address, which will be used to determine whether it is a new or existing user.

has_hornet_account.title: Whether this user has a Hornet account.

two_factor_enabled.title: Whether this user has two factor enabled.

user.title: To be used for serialization only!

archive_enabled.title: Whether the committee archive is enabled for this committee.

admin.title: If checked, this user has admin rights for the association.

internal_email.title: Internal email address of the association user.
internal_email.description: This is equals the internalUsername @ domain

internal_username.title: The internal username is combined with the association domain to form the association e-mail address.

mail_size.title: User-specific mailbox limit.
mail_size.description: Saved as string, convert to bytes using SizeConverter.

web_email_size.title: Combined web & email size limit.
